sentences.en: Adelies feed on tiny aquatic creatures, such as shrimplike krill, but also eat fish and squid.
sentences.cn: 阿德利以小型水生动物为食, 比如磷虾, 但有时也吃鱼和鱿鱼.

sentences.en: Don't worry. Whales don't eat clown fish, they eat krill.
sentences.cn: 别担心. 鲸不吃小丑鱼, 他们吃磷虾.

sentences.en: It is not surprising that each whale devours more than one ton of krill daily.
sentences.cn: 每只鲸鱼一天吞吃一吨多磷虾,这不足为奇.

sentences.en: K : Antarctic krill oil gelcaps, 500 mg each. How many do you take?
sentences.cn: 南极磷胶囊每个含量500毫克. 你一次吃多少?

sentences.en: Krill oils have also proved to have enormous health benefits.
sentences.cn: 磷酸虾油也给你的健康带来足够大的效益.

sentences.en: Krill swam with the plankton , a school of young menhaden swam after the krill.
sentences.cn: 磷虾游弋其中,后面跟着一大群鲱鱼.

sentences.en: Like all crustaceans, krill must molt in order to grow.
sentences.cn: 象所有甲壳纲, 磷虾必须蜕变为了增长.

sentences.en: Penguins and seals breed on the icy shores and fish for krill in the cool water.
sentences.cn: 企鹅和海豹则在结冰的海岸上繁衍后代,并在冰冷的海水中捕食磷虾.

sentences.en: The ocean contains huge amounts of tiny sea - animals called krill.
sentences.cn: 海洋拥有巨量的叫做鳞虾的小型动物.

sentences.en: The scientists say higher water temperatures have reduced the suppply of fish and krill.
sentences.cn: 科学家们说较高的水温减少了鱼和鳞虾的供应.

sentences.en: Thousands of penguins have already died from a shortage of krill.
sentences.cn: 数千只企鹅因为磷虾匮乏已经死亡。

sentences.en: You might see krill listed as one of the ingredients.
sentences.cn: 你可能会看见鳞虾在配料之列.
